channel.title: Getting my server online (Help please?)
channel.description: Ok im running my server off a laptop. I've portforwarded, got no-ip and No-ip DUC and set all it up. Everythings good except only computers under my internet connection can get onto my server using my Computers IP. How do i make it so every1 can get onto my server??
